name: Very Long Spell
description:
An action roguelike where the player is a magician who must take into account the casting time of his spells to defeat his numerous enemies

Controls MovementW,A,S,D / Directional Arrow
DodgeSpace
Start Spell IncantationLeft Click
Credit MeTheoDesigner - Programmer - Artist - SFX artist
Music (Royalty free) Muzaproduction "Do-it-your-self" - "Next" - "Go Faster" - "The Ring" - "Hellfire" TommyMutiu"Deadite - Ash vs Evil dead song" LiteSaturation"Metal Blues 120 bpm - Full" GeriArt"Rammstein style metal" Lesfm"elevator-music-bossa-nova-background-music-version-40s"
